alert.note: Alert for Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 2:35PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Shasta County through 330 PM PDT... At 234 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vollmers, or 14 miles north of Shasta Dam, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... O`brien, Lakehead-Lakeshore, Lakehead, Vollmers, Pollard Flat and Sugarloaf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
